item.title: Hard Drive Reliability
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: From the Backblaze Hard Drive Reliability Stats for Q2 2015: As far as 3TB drives go, we have replaced nearly all of our Seagate 3TB drives. The annual failure rate graph does not paint a pretty picture for Seagate. It is great to see companies that have to deal with hard drives on a large […]
item.content:encoded:
From the Backblaze Hard Drive Reliability Stats for Q2 2015:

As far as 3TB drives go, we have replaced nearly all of our Seagate 3TB drives.

The annual failure rate graph does not paint a pretty picture for Seagate.

It is great to see companies that have to deal with hard drives on a large scale publish information like this. While I might have to make similar decision ( what hard drive to buy for a home file server ), I’ll never have 47,561 drives spinning at my house.
